title: MD
biography: Carmencita M. David-Padilla is a Filipino clinical geneticist and pediatrician who is recognized as a National Scientist of the Philippines.
aiSummary: Carmencita Padilla is a genetics specialist with an H-index of 27 at National Institutes of Health Philippines (Member). Has been published in Science, JAMA Pediatrics, Frontiers in Cell and Developmental Biology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
